name: Viktor
title: the Herald of the Arcane
shortBio: The fully biomechanical evolution of his former self, Viktor has embraced his Glorious Evolution and become something of a messiah to his followers. He sacrificed his own humanity under the logic that eliminating emotion would thereby eliminate suffering—and now seeks to bring the revelation of the hexcore to the rest of the world, even if they're incapable of understanding the benefit. After all, to this master of the arcane, violence is merely a variable necessary to balance the ultimate equation.

skins.name: Full Machine Viktor
skins.description: Created from the same circuitry as the Full Metal champion, Jayce, Viktor was cast into the tunnels beneath the robot fighting arenas to serve as a janitoribot—while his twin was groomed for glory, simulcast en español. Upgrading himself with the cast-offs of the destroyed, he has sworn la venganza.

skins.name: Creator Viktor
skins.description: The creator of the Battlecast machine army, Viktor has perfected the art of transplanting living brains into low-tech, mass-produced weapons. But his work is far from complete, and even now he tinkers on newer, deadlier creations to crush all who oppose him.

skins.name: Death Sworn Viktor
skins.description: On a cold, dreary night, a pioneering inventor was tried and hanged for preaching his glorious vision of the future—a world in which the living knelt before the dead. Death had to admire Viktor's conviction, and sent him back into the mortal world, blessed with powers beyond imagination.

skins.name: PsyOps Viktor

chromas.name: PsyOps Viktor (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: PsyOps Viktor (Hunter)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 PsyOps event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 PsyOps event.

skins.description: Leader of the rogue military known as the Black Rose Group, Viktor is a psychic technomancer whose vision for a utopian world was abandoned when he suddenly departed High Command decades prior. Obsessed with an alien 'gate' uncovered during the Arctic Ops event, his experiments into human bioweapons would allow him to breach it and upend the global order.

skins.name: High Noon Viktor

chromas.name: High Noon Viktor (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: High Noon Viktor (Nomad)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the MSI 2022 High Noon event.

skins.description: Many a road to Hell was paved with good intent. Dr. Viktor may be the Mechanical Devil's kept engineer now, but his work began as charity: trying to “rehome” the souls of the dead in clockwork bodies, in order to circumvent mortality itself. Shame that Mordekaiser saw the good doctor's kindness and struck him a deal he could not deny.

skins.name: Arcane Savior Viktor
skins.description: Viktor wanted nothing to do with hextech after the death of his assistant, Sky—but the arcane had different plans for him. In the undercity, he found a new purpose as a healer thanks to the hexcore's effect on him. Now he hopes to show everyone the true power and promise of hextech, should they choose to accept it.

skins.name: Machine Herald Viktor

chromas.name: Machine Herald Viktor (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: Viktor was once a brilliant scientist focused on the promise of technology. Convinced that flesh and emotions inhibited progress, he transcended his own frailty through relentless augmentation. Now, as the steel herald of a new age, he leads all toward the Glorious Evolution—and a world reforged in his image.

passive.name: Glorious Evolution
passive.description: Viktor gains Hex Fragments whenever he kills an enemy. With every 100 Hex Fragments he obtains, Viktor permanently augments an active ability. After upgrading all of his basic abilities, he can gather 100 Hex Fragments to augment his ultimate ability.

spells.name: Siphon Power
spells.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit with magic damage, which grants him a shield and empowers his next basic attack.

Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus move speed after casting the Ability.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Viktor blasts an enemy, dealing @TotalMissileDamage@ magic damage and granting Viktor @ShieldLevelScaling@ Shield for @BuffDuration@ seconds.

Viktor's next Attack within 4 seconds deals @AttackTotalDMG@ magic damage.

Upgraded: Grants @TotalAugmentedShieldValue@ Shield and Viktor additionally gains @AugmentMoveSpeedBonus@% Move Speed for @BuffDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Gravity Field
spells.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies caught within its radius. Enemies who stay in the field for too long become stunned.

Augment: Viktor's spells apply a slow to enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for @FieldDuration@ seconds, Slowing enemies inside it by @SlowPotency*-1@%. Enemies who remain within its radius for 1.25 seconds are Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Upgraded Passive: Viktor's Abilities Slow by @AugmentSlow@% for 1 second.


@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Hextech Ray
spells.description:
Viktor uses his biomechanical arm to fire a Hextech Ray that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows in the Hextech Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Viktor fires a hextech ray in a chosen direction, dealing @LaserDamage@ magic damage to any enemies it hits.

Upgraded: An aftershock follows Hextech Ray, dealing @AftershockDamage@ magic damage.


@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Arcane Storm
spells.description:
Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm on the field, dealing magic damage and interrupting enemy channels. The storm periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies and can be redirected by Viktor.

Augment: The Arcane Storm moves 25% faster, and whenever champions die after taking damage from it, the storm grows and increases in its duration.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm in an area for @StormDuration@ seconds, which instantly deals @InitialBurstDamage@ magic damage followed by @SubsequentBurstDamage@ magic damage per second to surrounding enemies. The storm automatically follows champions it has recently damaged.

Recast: Viktor can manually move the storm.

Upgraded: The storm moves @AugmentBoost*100@% faster. If a champion that the storm has damaged dies, the storm increases its size and its duration by @Tooltip_DurationExtension@ seconds (up to @MaxGrowths@ times).

@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
